doc.name: CC3000Module
doc.description:
This actor represents the CC3000 Wi-Fi module and receives values to control its operation and send packets.

The code generator supplies the method contents, thus this class has no methods.
doc.author: Robert Bui
doc.port: The packetToSend input port. The type is int array.
The sending input port. The type is boolean.
The packetSize input port. The type is int.
The dataOut output port. The type is int array.
